Uses of Package
xxl.core.spatial.geometries

Packages that use xxl.core.spatial.geometries
xxl.core.spatial.geometries The package geometries provides interfaces for a spatial data model which conforms to the geometry model of the OGC Simple Features Specification for SQL (See http://www.opengis.org for further details). 
xxl.core.spatial.geometries.cursors A collection of spatial queries. 
xxl.core.spatial.geometries.predicates Useful spatial predicates such as Contains, Overlap, DistanceWithin, etc . 
 

Classes in xxl.core.spatial.geometries used by xxl.core.spatial.geometries
Curve2D
          A Curve is a one-dimensional geometric object usually stored as a sequence of points, with the subtype of Curve specifying the form of the interpolation between points.
Geometry2D
          This is the base interface of the geometry model in XXL.
GeometryCollection2D
          A GeometryCollection2D is a geometry that is a collection of 1 or more geometries.
LinearRing2D
          A LinearRing is a LineString that is both closed and simple.
LineString2D
          A LineString is a Curve with linear interpolation between points.
MultiCurve2D
          A MultiCurve2D is a one-dimensional GeometryCollection whose elements are Curves.
MultiSurface2D
          A GeometryCollection which can only hold Surface2D- objects

See 		Point2D
          A Point2D is a 0-dimensional geometry and represents a single location in coordinate space.
Polygon2D
          A Curve is a one-dimensional geometric object usually stored as a sequence of points, with the subtype of Curve specifying the form of the interpolation between points.
Surface2D
          A Surface is a two-dimensional geometric object.
 

Classes in xxl.core.spatial.geometries used by xxl.core.spatial.geometries.cursors
Geometry2D
          This is the base interface of the geometry model in XXL.
Point2D
          A Point2D is a 0-dimensional geometry and represents a single location in coordinate space.
 

Classes in xxl.core.spatial.geometries used by xxl.core.spatial.geometries.predicates
Geometry2D
          This is the base interface of the geometry model in XXL.
